title: Netflix Doesn’t Understand Sokka!
description:
Avatar The Last Airbender is the next legendary series to get a live action remake and, already, Netflix and its showrunners are making questionable decisions that sacrifice deep character growth for the sake of a "modern audience." #AvatarTheLastAirbender #Netflix #LiveActionRemake #CharacterGrowth"

If you liked this check out my main channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz1fTbwui7o5aDZ6W1dOLTQ
